title: Report: Google’s new smartphones called Nexus 5X and Nexus 6P | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Nexus]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * Nevertheless, it’s probably good for consumers – and tech journalists – tohave a little differentiation in product naming.**Related:[Best Android Smartphones 2015](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best-android-phones-1_round-up)**Rumours have been flying about these two new phones for a good while now, soit’s exciting that we don’t have much longer to wait.All should be revealed on Tuesday, September 29, at Google’s press event.Also tipped to appear at the event are new details about [Android 6.0Marshmallow](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinions/android-m-features), apossible Nexus tablet, and a revamped version of the Google Chromecast.Do you like these tipped names for the new Nexus phones? Let us know in thecomments.**Check out our smartphone buyer’s video guide below:**
